attributes.action: Stop the age discrimination in getting a job for the over 50’s
attributes.background: I have been applying for many jobs and nothing, so the question has been asked on Facebook, amongst friends and family and the answer is yes there is age discrimination against the over 50’s

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It is already against the law (the Equality Act 2010) to discriminate against someone because of their age, so we're not sure what further action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/discrimination-your-rights/types-of-discrimination
